description:
This Terra bartape is designed for riders who love to spend their time on trails and unpaved roads. Treat your drop-bar bike to a some fresh bartape and hit the roads less travelled. The combination of Bondcush construction and a gel backer soaks up the road buzz and keeps your hands from going numb.

  • Microtex material has a leather-like texture with improved durability
  • 3mm-thick tape uses Bondcush and gel backer to provide comfort
  • Tacky finish keeps the tape grippy in all conditions
  • Includes 2 bar end plugs, 2 pieces of finishing tape and 2 short tape sections to cover the shifter clamp area
name: Fizik Terra Microtex Bondcush Gel Tacky Handlebar Tape
